participant_1.background:
I got married in a park to celebrate my love of nature.
i wish my boyfriend didn t want an open relationship.
i believe in love at first sight.
I don't have a car, but I do have a great reading nook in my house.
i listen to classical music.

participant_2.background:
My pets are a great way to teach my kids about responsibility and compassion.
My favorite place to eat is the local diner, where the staff knows my name and the food is delicious.
I'm a 25-year-old female who loves the Fourth of July because the fireworks are so beautiful, but I'm scared of left turns.
I like to take drives in my classic car and listen to the engine rumble.
i commute by bus.

content.text: Hey! I'm interested in learning more about you. What's your favorite thing to do?
I love spending time with my family and friends. We like to go on adventures together and try new things.
That sounds like fun! I love going on adventures too. What was the last adventure you had?
We went to the beach last weekend and went swimming, sunbathing, and playing in the sand. It was a lot of fun!
That sounds really nice! I love the beach. I wish I could go more often.
Me too! It's such a great place to relax and have fun.
What else do you like to do for fun?
I also like to read, listen to music, and watch movies. I'm a big fan of classic movies.
Oh, I love classic movies too! What's your favorite classic movie?
That's a tough question! I have so many favorites. But I think one of my favorites is "Casablanca." It's such a classic love story.
I love "Casablanca" too! It's such a great movie. I love the ending.
I'm glad you like it too! It's one of my favorite movies.
It's one of my favorites too! We should watch it together sometime.
